climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: [Non-Slip & Safe]: Our boho rug for office with a nice grip are coated with a TPR backing that effectively keeps the rug in place over the hard floor and prevents dangerous movement and slipping.

[Machine Washable Rugs]: Easy care for your busy life and reduce your maintenance cost. Lahome accent rug makes it more durable and stain resistant whether it's pet urine or stains from everyday activities.

[Lightweight & Not Stuck Door]: A low 0.15” pile height won’t trap dirt and they on the surface can be removed easily, which makes it easy to clean, lightweight and reduces tripping risks; perfect for high traffic areas, underneath furniture and doorway.

[Kid & Pet Friendly]: This carpets for living room is skin-friendly, durable and non-shedding, suitable for children and pets play and roll around in. The soft surface is safe for protecting kids' knees while playing.

[Foldable Floor Carpet]: Foldable entry rugs for inside house make it easier to take it in or out. Rugs may contain temporary creases upon arrival, you could try rolling it up in the opposite direction for two full days, then laying it flat on a clean floor.
body.description: Area rugs help bring color, warmth and definition to any part of your home, from the front door to the bedroom. They're a great way to show your personal style and suit the fussiest of feet. Whether you are looking for a quality rug for years to come or just an impromptu design change in your home decor, Lahome rugs are the perfect choice.Features:-This popular rug from Lahome comes in a great assortment of colors and designs to suit the most discerning decorating needs. - Soft and dense with a subtle beautiful pattern, these rugs are made for maximum comfort, which provides a nice soft feel to your feet. - Available array of various sizes, colors and patterns make decorating floors easy, entertaining, and enjoyable.It can be used in the living room, bedroom, children's room, etc. - Rugs bring comfort and atmosphere, large ones define the seating area in the living room, runners soften your steps in the hallway and door mats welcome you home. - Clean with a water based detergent and a soft brush, vacuum regularly, placing the beater bar and brush at the highest setting as to avoid excess wear. Accent your home and add a soft touch to your house with Lahome rugs. Buy it now.Note1.The digital images on our website are as accurate as possible. Due to differences in computer monitors, some rug colors may vary slightly. 7.Lengths and widths may vary from the published dimensions. We do our best to provide you with an exact measurement, but please be advised that some variation exists.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful rugs! The muted pinks are perfect. I put one at my entrance and another one in front of my couch. I absolutely love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug seems to be a good quality. Softer and ticker than my high end rug in another room. This I bought just to go under a desk in an office and it worked perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No so good packaging
reviews.reviewText: I liked the rug. It fit just right in my foyer. The only problem was the packaging. Instead of rolling the rug, they folded it and placed it in plastic. The problem with this rubber backed rug is now it has a permanent crease I'll never get out. I wanted a distressed look, but not one that was ready for replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars More blue than grey
reviews.reviewText: It is grey but has more blue/ denim color than I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice rug

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: nice price, just right for bathroom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Folded and permanently creased
reviews.reviewText: This rug came folded up, stiff and creased. I tried washing it to remove the creasing and they didn’t work. It’s also not staying in place on my floor. Terrible product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with the Product

reviews.reviewText: Je suis surprise du prix pour la qualité moyenne du produit. Plus ou moins satisfaite. Couleur est tel que l’image, mais l’épaisseur et la pesanteur laisse à désirer puisqu’e les rebords se soulèvent.
